snippet.title: The Sundew [Switch/PC] Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sundew is a retro/pixel art dark adventure game set in the aftermath of a devastating future war, where the world as we know it was twisted by flames into a terrifying new dystopia.


More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/14803/


The Sundew is coming to Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam) in summer 2021.

#TheSundew #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
